name: Ulysses Plein air et art de vivre au Québec 2e
categories: Plein air et art de vivre au Québec 2e
description: Outdoors and Lifestyle in Quebec - 125 Epicurean Holidays offers getaways and trip plans that combine outdoor activities and the beauties of nature with the sweet pleasures of life. A cycling day followed by a meal at a legendary regional table, a weekend of hiking plus relaxation in a spa, a nice kayak ride before a delicious seafood dish in an enchanting site – these are the kind of experiences detailed by this unique guidebook. Both a practical guide to planning your next getaway and a beautiful piece of inspiration, this book combines exhilarating outdoor activities with hedonistic experiences for the senses and the spirit. Text is in French.
